description.en: Given 2 ints, return their sum. Unless the sum is between 10 and 19 inclusive, then return 20.
description.ru: Даны 2 целых. Верните их сумму. Если сумма между 10 и 19 включительно, верните 20.
description.uz: 2 butun son berilgan. Ularning yig‘indisini qaytaring. Agar yig‘indi 10 dan 19 gacha (shu jumladan) bo‘lsa, 20 qaytaring.

solution: function sortaSum(a, b) { let sum = a + b; if (sum >= 10 && sum <= 19) return 20; return sum; }
